description: Antidiagonals of square array in which k-th row (k>0) is an A.P. of difference 2^(k-1).
references: G. H. Hardy, A Theorem Concerning the Infinite Cardinal Numbers, Quart. J. Math., 35 (1904), p. 90 = Collected Papers, Vol. VII, p. 430.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 06 2000
